item.title: Campfire LD46
item.description:
Campfire is a 2D platformer where you carry a lamp through a forest. As your lamp dies out, you lose vision of your surroundings. Rush from campfire to campfire to keep your lamp alive as you make your way to the end.

Key Features:

  • Basic Level Editing Functionality/Tooling
  • 2D Sprite Sheet Animation State Machine
  • 2D Custom Lighting
  • Platforming Mechanics and Physics
  • Audio System with Pooled Voices

item.title: Game Engine in DX11
item.description:
Game Engine written in DX11. Supports various common Engine features, such as Skeletal Animation, Post FX like Bloom and Gaussian Blur, and more.

Key Features:

  • Normal Mapping
  • Skeletal Animation
  • Job System
  • Material System
  • Phong Lighting
  • Post FX (Bloom, Gaussian Blur)
  • Custom Memory Allocators
  • SIMD Math Library

item.title: Heightmap Terrain Renderer
item.description:
Renders Heightmaps (Grayscale and RGB) in OpenGL, then allows the user to manipulate how that Heightmap is viewed in various ways.

Key Features:

  • Heightmap Rendering (Grayscale and RGB)
  • Texturing of Heightmap (Dynamically Calculate UV)
  • Dynamic Smoothing of Heightmap
  • Dynamic Calculation of Heightmap Normals
  • Blinn-Phong Lighting
  • User-Controlled Transformations of Heightmap

item.title: Monte-Carlo Raytracer
item.description:
Monte-Carlo Raytracer with a Physically-Based BDRF.

Key Features:

  • Standard Raytracing with Point Lights
  • Monte-Carlo Raytracing with Area Lights
  • Phong Shading
  • Shading with Physically-Based BDRF
  • Multithreading
  • Bounding Volume Hierarchy Acceleration
  • Recursive Reflections
  • Hard & Soft Shadows

item.title: Roller Coaster Simulation
item.description:
Roller Coaster Simulation in OpenGL using custom file format to specify Catmull-Rom spline segments.

Key Features:

  • Render Catmull-Rom Splines as Roller Coaster Track
  • Skybox Rendering
  • Blinn-Phong Lighting
  • Calculate Frenet-Frame of Track Dynamically
  • Custom Trackfile
  • Chain Multiple Tracks Together With C1 Continuity

item.title: Shadow and Ambient Occlusion Demo
item.description: OpenGL Demo for Shadow Mapping with Percentage Closer Filtering (PCF) and Screen Space Ambient Occlusion

item.title: UDP Tribes Networking Model Arena Battler Game
item.description:
Technologies: C++, Lua, Python, TCP, UDP, Peforce, D3D11

Key Features:

  • Navmesh Obstacle Navigation
  • Billboarded, Pooled Projectiles and index-based sampling from Texture
  • Physics for Characters and Projectiles
  • Server-Driven Object Loading
  • UDP Tribes Networking Stack
    • Based on This Paper
  • Prediction, Rollback, and Re-Simulation for Networked Objects
    • The characters move immediately without waiting for server response, then correct themselves by re-simulating up to the current time if Server and Client disagree
  • Time Synchronization between Clients and Server based on packet round trip time (RTT)
  • Rate Control of Packets (Dynamically Change Packet Size based on Network Conditions)
  • Network Debug Settings and Visualization
    • Simulated Packet Drop, Lag, etc.
